name: H.E.R.O. Returns
description:
H.E.R.O. Returns

-The history-

After many years of retirement an event in a coal mine causes our hero to leave his rest and enter service again.
What dangers await him? Will he survive his last adventure?

Guide our hero in more than 15 levels and 100 screens in which you must demonstrate your ability to control his unicopter through all the dangers he will face.

-The game-

Your task is to guide H.E.R.O. in the coal mines to rescue all the trapped miners without dying in the process.
H.E.R.O. counts with his reliable unicopter, his electric gun and a good bunch of dynamite.

-

Remember, if you want a physical copy you can get it at matranet.net!

Also, you can download the full source code at my Github repository.
